import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Navbar,Nav}from"react-bootstrap";import logo from"../../assets/icons/logo.png";import moon from"../../assets/icons/moon.png";import light from"../../assets/icons/light.png";import"./Header.css";import{UserContext}from"../../App";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{isDark,SetIsDark}=useContext(UserContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header ".concat(isDark?'dark':'light'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar,{expand:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{href:"#home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"",className:"logo img-fluid"// onClick={() => scroll.scrollToTop()}
})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"basic-navbar-nav"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Collapse,{id:"basic-navbar-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"justify-content-center align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primaryBtn ".concat(isDark?'dark':'light'),children:"Buy bakso"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"#about",children:"Docs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"#tokenomics",children:"Audit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center nightMode",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"moon ".concat(isDark?'':'light'),onClick:()=>SetIsDark(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:light,alt:"moon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slashSpan",children:"/"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"moon ".concat(isDark?'dark':''),onClick:()=>SetIsDark(true),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:moon,alt:"moon"})})]})]})})]})})});};export default Header;
